tool_description: Generates detailed route paths between ordered waypoints with turn-by-turn navigation data and route geometry.

ordered_waypoints.description: Array of waypoint coordinates in visit order as 'latitude,longitude' strings

route_preference.description: Routing preference: fastest, shortest, eco_friendly, or avoid_highways

vehicle_type.description: Vehicle type: car, truck, motorcycle, bicycle, or pedestrian

error_messages: Insufficient waypoints: Minimum 2 waypoints required for path calculation.
Invalid waypoint format: Use 'latitude,longitude' format for coordinates.
Invalid route preference: Use fastest, shortest, eco_friendly, or avoid_highways.
Invalid vehicle type: Use car, truck, motorcycle, bicycle, or pedestrian.
No route found: Unable to calculate route between specified waypoints.
Waypoint limit exceeded: Maximum 50 waypoints supported.
usage: Provide ordered waypoints with routing preferences and vehicle type. Returns detailed path with navigation instructions.

route_geometry.description: Array of coordinate points defining the route path

total_duration.description: Total estimated travel time in minutes

path_summary.description: Summary of the calculated path and key route characteristics
